definition: station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website
house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]

sentences.english: Terminal 3 of the airport is the single largest building, by floor space.
sentences.chinese: 機場的3號航站樓按佔地面積來說是最大的獨立建築。

sentences.english: Flights for Rome depart from Terminal 3.
sentences.chinese: 飛往羅馬的班機從3號航站樓出發。

sentences.english: It is located in the southwest side of the terminal of Beijing Capital Airport, in the northern part of the Airport's living area.
sentences.chinese: 坐落於首都機場航站樓西南側，位於機場生活區北端。

sentences.english: Chengdu Airport new terminal to open in 2012.
sentences.chinese: 成都機場新航站樓將於2012年開放。

sentences.english: Terminal 3 of the flight destinofion is the single largest creofeing, by floor spexpert.
sentences.chinese: 機場的3號航站樓按佔空中積來說是最大的獨立建築。

sentences.english: There's free shuttle bus between two terminals.
sentences.chinese: 如果您走錯航站樓，兩樓之間也設有免費擺渡車。

sentences.english: Mr. Ma on the site of Terminal 2 of Beijing Capital International Airport.
sentences.chinese: 在首都機場2號航站樓施工現場。

definition: Kai Tak Airport, international airport of Hong Kong from 1925 to 1998
domestic flight/internal line (air, train, ferry etc)
